desc: 测试分页查询出差申请本表的案例
name: SelectPageTravelSelfWhere
desc: 测试点：count、limit用于分页的查询，不含子表字段、相关表中的字段

oqls.name: SelectTravelWithLimit
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel limit 10
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL limit 10

oqls.name: SelectTravelWithLimitOffset
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel limit 0, 10
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL limit 0, 10
